Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2700 Production Way is desirably located at the base of Burnaby Mountain, near Simon Fraser University and Lougheed Town Centre. This location benefits from unparalleled access to all areas of Metro Vancouver through multiple arterial routes such as Trans-Canada Highway, Lougheed Highway, and North Road. Production Way University SkyTrain Station and a proposed gondola is a quick 10 minute walk away providing immediate rapid transit access.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Transit Access Production Way-University SkyTrain Station
Desservi par les transports en commun Production Way-University SkyTrain Station

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 3100 Production Way is a next-generation office campus, designed by ZGF Architecture to provide the optimal amount of natural light and climate. With LEED Gold Certification, the building consists of two towers, joined by a skybridge on 4 of the 10 floors. Large open floor plates allow for maximum efficiency and tenants will benefit from exterior spaces and amenities. 3100 Production Way is in a transit-oriented location with a unique proposed gondola to SFU campus and next to  Production Way University SkyTrain Station. The perfect balance between work and lifestyle, the building is near mountain biking, hiking, greenspace, colleges, and UniverCity.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE| BURNABY'S NEXT OFFICE BUILDING | 350,000 SQ.FT. ON RAPID TRANSIT

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Surrounded by numerous amenities, the location provides convenient arterial access to the Trans-Canada Highway, Willingdon Avenue, and Boundary Road, and is surrounded by an array of grocery, retail stores, restaurants, gyms, and banks. Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text: Sales Representative

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 7440 Fraser Park Drive is primely situated in the heart of the Big Bend industrial area of South Burnaby. This location provides direct access to all parts of the Lower Mainland, via Boundary Road and Marine Way. The location is transit friendly with the new 116 bus route providing connection to Metrotown SkyTrain Station (4 km away) and Edmonds SkyTrain Station (7 km away). The building is directly across from Fraser Foreshore Trail. It is easily accessible to food, shopping, and amenities with Marine Way Market, Big Bend Crossing, and Riverway Golf Course a quick 5-minute drive away

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Highlights: Modern “A” class office building, Large windows, lots of natural light, Large ground floor unit, Quality construction and finishes, Fully renovated in 2018, 28 perimeter private offices/ meeting rooms, 2 large boardroom, Modern furniture available, Showers on site, Ample parking on-site
